resp = client.search(
    query={
        "bool": {
            "filter": {
                "script": {
                    "script": "\n            double amount = doc['amount'].value;\n            if (doc['type'].value == 'expense') {\n              amount *= -1;\n            }\n            return amount < 10;\n          "
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
